name: Rok Bottom
description:
My first real Game Jam!!! (Ludum Dare 48)

(Bug where background goes too fast, so seizure warning)

(I apologize in advance for the poor quality of the game, I am very inexperienced, it doesn't even have sound  D:)

A fish has reached the time in his life when he needs to reproduce, and he found his mating hole. Unfortunately, he is a very light type of fish and needs to use a rock to dive to 300m under the surface, where the breeding chamber is. Once he arrives there he will have fulfilled his life, but it's going to take a couple of tries....

Luckily, the eggs will be well protected once he gets there!

Bigger rock: you have more hit points and you go faster.

Decreased acceleration: self-explanatory

Any criticism welcome.
